lead_paragraph: The race for the men’s European money title is down to 18 holes in Sotogrande, Spain, with Paul Casey in the lead. No. 2 Padraig Harrington, No. 3 David Howell and No. 4 Robert Karlsson were within four shots of Jeev Milkha Singh, the Volvo Masters leader, after yesterday’s third round.
